What search query should I use on Wikipedia to answer the query "can you explain to me what is Streamlit?"

Streamlit is a web framework that allows developers to create interactive web applications in a variety of programming languages. It is designed to be easy to use, with a focus on speed and simplicity. Streamlit provides a range of features, such as livereload, hot reloading, and stream data processing, that make it easy to develop and deploy web applications quickly and efficiently.
